Class SpeedUp

All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObject, IPowerUp
public class SpeedUp
extends SpriteObject
implements IPowerUp

SpeedUp Powerup. this class represents the SpeedUp powerup. its powers increase the steamrollers speed.

Author:
Felix
